first.name: Wyrd
first.content: Ok, I've had enough of this.|@let’s get out of here.

1.name: Norna
1.content: Yeah,|@we don’t get paid enough for jobs like this.

2.name: Wyrd
2.content: Listen up - You never saw us,|@we never saw you.|@Understood?

3.name: Norna
3.content: Also, whatever you do,@stay away from desert.@There’s definitely nothing weird going on out there.

4.name: Wyrd
4.content: …If we meet again,@we’ll be obligated to attack you.|@Plan your next moves carefully.
